text: Jacobo Morales (born 12 November 1934) is a Puerto Rican actor, poet, playwright, movie director and producer.Iniciará en Ponce el Festival de la Palabra. Sandra Torres Guzmán. La Perla del Sur. Ponce, Puerto Rico. Year 33, Issue 1663. Page 9. 14 October 2015. Retrieved 14 October 2015. He is a very well known director in Puerto Rico. His best known works were Dios los cría..., Nicolás y los demás, Lo que le pasó a Santiago, Linda Sara, Dios los cría II, and Angel. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Puerto Rican comedians Category:Puerto Rican movie actors Category:Puerto Rican stage actors Category:Puerto Rican television actors Category:Puerto Rican television personalities Category:Puerto Rican movie directors Category:Puerto Rican movie producers Category:Puerto Rican poets
title: Jacobo Morales
